CRIoT¶

template<typename K, class V>
class CRIoT_Control_VO¶

The server side structure which encodes full and delta updates.

Public Functions

CRIoT_Control_VO(vector<K> positive_keys, vector<K> negative_keys, float load_factor = 0.95, float othello_ratio = 1)¶

Constructor for CRIoT Control VO.

Parameters

  • positive_keys: A vector of positive keys to be inserted.

  • negative_keys: A vector of negative keys to be inserted.

  • load_factor: How loaded the structure will be at initialization.

  • othello_ratio: Othello Ratio.

void init(vector<K> &positive_keys, vector<K> &negative_keys, float load_factor = 0.95, float othello_ratio = 1)¶

Alternate constructor for CRIoT Control VO.

Parameters

  • positive_keys: A vector of positive keys to be inserted.

  • negative_keys: A vector of negative keys to be inserted.

  • load_factor: How loaded the structure will be at initialization.

  • othello_ratio: Othello Ratio

vector<vector<uint8_t>> encode_full()¶

Encodes the data plane CRC as string arrays.

Return

The encoded bytes.

vector<uint8_t> encode_batch_summary(vector<pair<K, V>> key_value_pairs, vector<uint8_t> actions)¶

Encodes the batch summary, with all the updates.

Return

All of the information encoded.

Parameters

  • key_value_pairs: The key value pairs that are modified.

  • actions: The actions doen to the key value pairs.

vector<uint8_t> encode_summary(pair<K, V> kv, uint8_t action)¶

Encodes the summary for sending Parts are encoded in this order: the type of action, key, value, flipped_indexes size, flipped indexes. type of action can be add(0), remove(1), unrevoke(2), revoke(3)

Return

The encoded summary of bytes.

Parameters

  • kv: The key value pair that the action is done to.

  • action: The action done.

bool insert(pair<K, V> kv)¶

Inserts a key value pair into the structure.

Return

bool Indicating if the insert succeded without rebuild.

Parameters

  • kv: The key value pair to be inserted.

bool batch_insert(std::vector<pair<K, V>> kv_pairs)¶

Inserts key value pairs in a batch.

Return

If the structure needed to be rebuilt.

Parameters

  • kv_pairs: A vector of key value pairs to be inserted

bool setValue(pair<K, V> kv)¶

Flips a key value pair in the structure.

Return

bool Indicating if the flip succeded without rebuild.

Parameters

  • kv: The key value pair to be flipped.

void erase(K key)¶

Erases a key from the structure. TODO: IMPLEMENT

Parameters

  • key: The key to be erased.

V query(K key)¶

Queries the value of the key.

Return

The value of the key.

Parameters

  • key: The key to be queried.

template<typename K, class V>
class CRIoT_Data_VO¶

The client side structure for decoding full updates and delta updates.

Public Functions

CRIoT_Data_VO(DASS_Verifier<K, V> &install_patch)¶

COnstructor for CRIoT data

Parameters

  • install_patch: The DASS verifier where to install from

void rebuild(DASS_Verifier<K, V> &rebuild_patch)¶

Rebuilds the DASS from DASS verifier

Parameters

  • rebuild_patch: The DASS verifier where to build from

void decode_full(vector<uint8_t> &data)¶

Decodes the full update received.

Parameters

  • data: The data received from the server

void decode_batch_summary(vector<uint8_t> summary)¶

Decodes the batch summary

Parameters

  • summary: The summary that is to be decoded

void decode_sub_summary(vector<uint8_t> summary, int &offset)¶

Helper function for decoding summary, decodes individual keys from batch summary

Parameters

  • summary: The batch summary to be decoded

  • offset: Reference to the offset where where the next key starts

void decode_summary(vector<uint8_t> summary)¶

Decodes the summary Parts are decoded in this order: the type of action, key, value, flipped_indexes size, flipped indexes. type of action can be add(0), remove(1), unrevoke(2), revoke(3)

Parameters

  • summary: The vector of bytes of summary.

V query(const K key)¶

Queries a key from the structure.

Return

The value associated with the key.

Parameters

  • key: Key to be queried.

vector<V> batch_query(const vector<K> keys)¶

Queries keys in a batch

Return

Values of the keys queried

Parameters

  • keys: Keys to be queried

void insert(pair<K, V> kv, vector<uint32_t> &flipped_indexes)¶

Inserts a key with a value.

Parameters

  • kv: Key value pair to be inserted.

  • flipped_indexes: The vector of flipped indexes received.

void setValue(pair<K, V> &kv, vector<uint32_t> &flipped_indexes)¶

Sets a value.

Parameters

  • kv: Key .

  • flipped_indexes: The vector of flipped indexes received.
